#No Meta is ever Mordes Meta. 

So they will hide behind the excuse that he's just not in a Favourable Meta.  

Almost anything they say about Mordekaiser is Bullshit anyway.   

A  recent one. Which I have heard the same BS answer multiple times.
  Morde player" Can you remove the W passive since it doesn't do anything for Morde and use that to give him some Base stats" 

Meddler " if the experience passive doesn't do anything, then why would we compensate him if we  removed it. " 


To answer that: BECAUSE it's  has a calculated power budget  allotted to it as part of his Kit. Regardless of the fact you nerfed it to be Negligible in the early game.  
It still has  inherent  power attached to it and is easily sighted as removable by Most solo lane Morde mains In exchange for some  Base Movement speed.
 
Which would actually increase the Overall enjoyment of playing Morde: FROM Resigned to Inevitable Failure
